item.description:
Enfin!  At long last!

An invitation to M. Yeager's for a Saturday potluck brunch café! 

This is open to all of the area French speakers, whether you have been to his house before or not.  If you haven't, you are in for a treat!  It's an amazing house with many French artifacts et antiquités.  Bob is a great host and will make you feel very welcome.  He is a high school French teacher who speaks impeccable French and German.

Your contribution of something délicieux to share would be appreciated. There will be other people there from other groups.

Bienvenue!

 

For directions, you can search on mapquest or just do this: take Route 2 to the left exit for Route 17.  At the end of the very long exit there is a stoplight.  Go straight a short distance and turn left onto Overlook.  Then right onto Ridgewood (There might not be a sign) and follow it around.  There are two entrances to Ridgewood so if you miss the first one it's OK.

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French
